participant_1.background:
I want to have more fun with my siblings.
My most valued material possession is the notebook I keep my short stories in.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
I am a YouTuber who enjoys sharing my love of cooking with others.
I started a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I moved to the mountains to be closer to my mom and to enjoy skiing.
i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.
i like wide , open spaces.
I just finished painting my nails.
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in the mountains?
I love skiing! I moved here to be closer to my mom and to enjoy all that the mountains have to offer.
That's awesome! I love skiing too, but I'm a lot more of a beginner.
You should come visit me sometime! I'll teach you how to do some cool tricks.
That's so nice of you! I'd love to visit sometime.
Great! We can go skiing, go hiking, or just relax and enjoy the scenery.
I love the idea of hiking and exploring. I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun together.
I'm sure we would! I'm always looking for new people to hang out with.
Me too! I'm kind of a loner, but I'm really trying to get out more and meet new people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're trying to put yourself out there. It's always good to make new friends.
Yeah, it is. I'm excited to meet you!
Me too! I'm sure we're going to have a lot of fun together.
